task.title: How to Receive mail?
task.shortdesc: Here you can find information on how to receive mail using the Mail App.

taskbody.prereq: In order to be able to receive emails in yout Mail App, you have to have it installed on your mobile device and be logged in.See the guide to learn how you can sign in.

result.p: You will be able to see a list of your incoming emails sorted by latest receiving date.
If you are receiving unwanted emails, check out the page.
